tool_description: Determines optimal launch windows based on orbital mechanics constraints, target orbits, and mission requirements.

earliest_launch_time.description: Earliest possible launch time in UTC

latest_launch_time.description: Latest possible launch time in UTC

launch_azimuth_range_deg.description: Allowed launch azimuth range [min, max] in degrees

optimize_for.description: Optimization criterion: fuel_efficiency, mission_duration, or ground_track

avoid_populated_areas.description: Avoid launch trajectories over populated areas

rendezvous_target.description: Target spacecraft identifier for rendezvous missions

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be -90 to +90 degrees, longitude must be -180 to +180 degrees.
Invalid target parameters: target_inclination_deg must be 0-180 degrees, target_altitude_km must be > 150 km.
Invalid time range: earliest_launch_time must be before latest_launch_time.
Invalid azimuth range: launch_azimuth_range_deg must contain exactly 2 elements with min < max.
Impossible launch: Target inclination cannot be achieved from launch site latitude.
Invalid optimization criterion: Use one of [fuel_efficiency, mission_duration, ground_track].
usage: Specify launch site coordinates, target orbit parameters, and time constraints. Tool finds optimal launch opportunities within the specified window.

optimal_launch_times.description: Recommended launch times in UTC ISO 8601 format

launch_azimuths_deg.description: Required launch azimuth for each optimal time

delta_v_requirements_kmps.description: Delta-V requirement for each launch opportunity

window_duration_minutes.description: Duration of each launch window in minutes

best_launch_time.description: Single best launch time based on optimization criterion
